name: blue-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures sleep.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A flute made from blue glass that awakens sleeping Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A flute made from blue glass that awakens sleeping Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A flute made from blue glass. It awakens sleeping Pokémon.
